
find_package(Gettext REQUIRED)

SUBDIRS(
    am ar as ast bg bn bn_IN br bs ca cs cy da de el
    en_GB en_US es et eu fa fi fr ga gl gu he hi hr
    hu ia id ilo is it ja ka kk kn ko ks ku lo lt lv
    mai mk ml mr ms nb nds nl nn no or pa pl pt pt_BR ro
    ru si sk sl sq sr sr@latin sv ta te tg tr uk ur vi
    zh_CN zh_HK zh_TW
    )
